summary: Page 29 (book page 49/mem-tet). Covers sections 106-112 with two grouping headers ('אמונה' and 'צדקה וגמילות חסדים'). All section numbers are correct. The structure properly captures the transition between topic areas. Section 112 continues to next page.

issues.description: In section 110, the first paragraph is marked is_makor: false and the second is marked is_makor: true. Per the standard structure, the makor paragraph should come first. Looking at the image, the text labeled 'מקור המצוה:' appears to be the second paragraph 'ומה שאוכלין בעוה"ז...' with source 'יכ"ס ש"ע ט'. The first paragraph (about the midrash) is additional body text. The makor/body ordering is reversed from convention.
issues.original_text: first paragraph is_makor: false, second is_makor: true
issues.corrected_text: first paragraph should be is_makor: true, second should be is_makor: false

issues.description: Section 111 about מצות צדקה has no source_ref on the makor paragraph. The sources are embedded inline in the text ([דברים יד כב], [תענית ט.], [מלאכי ג י]) rather than appearing in a final parenthetical. This is a structural difference from other sections.
